analyzed: 隋天竺三藏達磨笈多譯

analyzed: 不空見本事品之餘「復次，不空見！
translated: The Remainder of the Chapter on the Past Activities of Akṣobhya, Furthermore, Akṣobhya!

original: 彼精進王以慈愛憐愍多好行檀，常為大會無礙施主，天下所有沙門、婆羅門、貧窮、疾病、諸乞求者，隨須給與，無有休厭。
analyzed: 彼精進王以慈愛憐愍多好行檀，常為大會無礙施主，天下所有沙門、婆羅門、貧窮、疾病、諸乞求者，隨須給與，無有休厭。
translated: King Viśeṣagāmin, with loving-kindness, compassion, and generosity, always held great assemblies and was an unobstructed donor. Whatever śramaṇas, brāhmaṇas, poor, sick, and beggars there were in the world, he provided for them according to their needs, without rest or weariness.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Akṣobhya!

original: 彼精進王凡所統領八萬四千城邑、聚落，皆是淨業勝因所感，七寶合成。
analyzed: 彼精進王凡所統領八萬四千城邑、聚落，皆是淨業勝因所感，七寶合成。
translated: The eighty-four thousand cities and villages that King Viśeṣagāmin ruled were all the result of his pure and excellent karma, and were composed of the seven treasures.

original: 於諸城上一一復造八萬四千栴檀樓觀、諸門、左右亭傳、路次，悉有堂舍，眾寶莊嚴。
analyzed: 於諸城上一一復造八萬四千栴檀樓觀、諸門、左右亭傳、路次，悉有堂舍，眾寶莊嚴。
translated: In each of the cities, he built eighty-four thousand sandalwood towers, with pavilions to the left and right of the gates, and along the roads there were houses, all adorned with various treasures.

original: 門無晝夜，常開不閉，以擬一切等獲大安。
analyzed: 門無晝夜，常開不閉，以擬一切等獲大安。
translated: The gates were always open day and night, without closing, in order to provide great peace and comfort to all.

original: 又諸城內衢巷、街陌，恒然燈燭有大光明，令彼人民各力為作，同共受斯安隱快樂。
analyzed: 又諸城內衢巷、街陌，恒然燈燭有大光明，令彼人民各力為作，同共受斯安隱快樂。
translated: Moreover, in the cities, the streets and alleys were always lit with lamps, providing a great illumination, enabling the people to work with vigor, and to enjoy this peace and happiness together.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aṅkura,

original: 彼精進王時有二子，一名師子，二名師子意，諸根明利，身相圓滿，有大威德，具足神通，皆已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
analyzed: 彼精進王時有二子，一名師子，二名師子意，諸根明利，身相圓滿，有大威德，具足神通，皆已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translated: at that time King Viśeṣagāmin had two sons, one named Siṃha and the other Siṃhamati. Their faculties were sharp, their physical characteristics were perfect, they had great authority, and were endowed with spiritual powers. They had already given rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aṅkura,

original: 當爾之時，有佛、世尊，號曰寶聚如來、應供、等正覺、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，出現於世，常為天、人、梵、魔、沙門、婆羅門、諸龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、乃至一切人非人等宣明正法，初、中、後善，義味深奧，其文亦善，純備無雜，清白梵行。
analyzed: 當爾之時，有佛、世尊，號曰寶聚如來、應供、等正覺、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，出現於世，常為天、人、梵、魔、沙門、婆羅門、諸龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、乃至一切人非人等宣明正法，初、中、後善，義味深奧，其文亦善，純備無雜，清白梵行。
translated: At that time, there was a Buddha, a World-Honored One, named Ratnasaṃbhava Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-Gone, Knower of the Secular World, Unsurpassed Person, Tamer, Teacher of Gods and Men, Buddha, World-Honored One, who appeared in the world, always proclaiming the true Dharma for gods, humans, Brahmā, Māra, renunciants, brahmins, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, and even all humans and non-humans, with good beginning, middle, and end, profound meaning, and well-spoken words, complete and unadulterated, the pure holy life.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aṅkura,

original: 時彼寶聚如來、應供、等正覺常與七十二億百千諸大聲聞——皆阿羅漢，具足神通、有大威德——近善住城說法教化。
analyzed: 時彼寶聚如來、應供、等正覺常與七十二億百千諸大聲聞——皆阿羅漢，具足神通、有大威德——近善住城說法教化。
translated: at that time, Ratnasaṃbhava Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened, was always with seventy-two koṭīs of great śrāvakas - all arhats, endowed with spiritual powers and great majestic virtue - teaching the Dharma and transforming beings near the city of Subhaṭa.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Ajita,

original: 爾時，寶聚如來、應供、等正覺即於食時著衣持鉢，與彼七十二億百千大聲聞眾前後圍遶，威容詳雅，入善住城次第乞食。
analyzed: 爾時，寶聚如來、應供、等正覺即於食時著衣持鉢，與彼七十二億百千大聲聞眾前後圍遶，威容詳雅，入善住城次第乞食。
translated: at that time, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One Ratna-kūṭa, at the time of the meal, put on his robes and took his alms bowl, surrounded by a great assembly of seventy-two koṭīs of hundreds of thousands of great śrāvakas, with dignified appearance and elegance, entered the city of Sudharmā and went for alms in order.

original: 「彼精進王適與二子在高樓上，遙望見彼寶聚如來大眾圍遶，端嚴殊特，威德巍巍。
analyzed: 「彼精進王適與二子在高樓上，遙望見彼寶聚如來大眾圍遶，端嚴殊特，威德巍巍。
translated: King Vīryavān was just with his two sons on a high tower, looking from afar and seeing the Tathāgata Ratna-kūṭa surrounded by the great assembly, with an extraordinary and majestic appearance.

original: 行人觀覩莫不樂見，諸根清淨，心慮澹然，上下調伏勝奢摩陀，到於第一功德彼岸，具足圓滿一切種地。
analyzed: 行人觀覩莫不樂見，諸根清淨，心慮澹然，上下調伏勝奢摩陀，到於第一功德彼岸，具足圓滿一切種地。
translated: the people who saw him walking were delighted, with pure faculties, a tranquil mind, subdued above and below, surpassing śamatha, reaching the other shore of the supreme merit, fully endowed with all kinds of grounds.

original: 「王既見已，生奇特心，喜勇無量，即與二子取諸華鬘、塗香、末香、及餘名香俱出宮門，速疾持詣寶聚如來、應供、等正覺所奉獻供養佛及大眾，頂禮佛足，却住一面。
analyzed: 「王既見已，生奇特心，喜勇無量，即與二子取諸華鬘、塗香、末香、及餘名香俱出宮門，速疾持詣寶聚如來、應供、等正覺所奉獻供養佛及大眾，頂禮佛足，却住一面。
translated: Having seen this, the king was filled with wonder and joy. He immediately took the flower garlands, ointments, incense powders, and other famous fragrances with his two sons, left the palace gate, and quickly went to where the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One Ratna-Kūṭa was. He made offerings to the Buddha and the great assembly, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, and then stood to one side.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aṅkura,

original: 彼精進王及其二子，即便要請寶聚如來與諸大眾盡形供養——所謂衣服、器具、飲食、醫藥——凡是所須悉皆奉給，庶事隆厚，聖眾獲安。
analyzed: 彼精進王及其二子，即便要請寶聚如來與諸大眾盡形供養——所謂衣服、器具、飲食、醫藥——凡是所須悉皆奉給，庶事隆厚，聖眾獲安。
translated: that King Vīryakīrti and his two sons then invited the Tathāgata Ratna-Kūṭa and the great assembly to make offerings for the rest of their lives - namely, clothing, utensils, food and drink, medicine - in short, all their needs were provided, and the holy assembly was made comfortable.

original: 是精進王與其二子，宿植德本常求佛法，今既遭逢又蒙受請，心生歡喜，慶幸特深。
analyzed: 是精進王與其二子，宿植德本常求佛法，今既遭逢又蒙受請，心生歡喜，慶幸特深。
translated: King Vīryakīrti and his two sons, having planted roots of virtue in the past, always sought the Buddha's teachings. Now that they had encountered [the Buddha] and received his invitation, they were filled with joy and gratitude.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aṅkura,

original: 時彼寶聚如來、應供、等正覺於天人中說法教化，所應作已，便於中夜入無餘涅槃。
analyzed: 時彼寶聚如來、應供、等正覺於天人中說法教化，所應作已，便於中夜入無餘涅槃。
translated: At that time, the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One Ratnagarbha, having taught the Dharma to gods and humans and accomplished what was to be done, entered parinirvāṇa in the middle of the night.

original: 「不空見！
analyzed: 「不空見！
translated: Amogha-darśana!

original: 時精進王聞彼世尊般涅槃已，即與夫人及其二子，躬率群臣及諸民眾，詣彼世尊般涅槃處。
analyzed: 時精進王聞彼世尊般涅槃已，即與夫人及其二子，躬率群臣及諸民眾，詣彼世尊般涅槃處。
translated: At that time, King Vīryavān, having heard of the World-Honored One's parinirvāṇa, together with his wife and two children, personally led his ministers and the common people to the place where the World-Honored One had entered parinirvāṇa.

original: 至已，敬禮世尊足下，悲號啼哭、椎胸大叫，舉身投地如樹中摧，躄地宛轉而傷歎曰：
analyzed: 至已，敬禮世尊足下，悲號啼哭、椎胸大叫，舉身投地如樹中摧，躄地宛轉而傷歎曰：
translated: Having arrived, he respectfully bowed at the feet of the World-Honored One, wept and wailed, beat his chest and cried out loudly, threw himself to the ground like a tree falling, rolled on the ground and lamented, saying:

original: 『世尊滅度一何駛哉？
analyzed: 『世尊滅度一何駛哉？
translated: How swiftly the World-Honored One has entered nirvāṇa!

original: 大聖涅槃，遺棄我等；
analyzed: 大聖涅槃，遺棄我等；
translated: The Great Sage has entered nirvāṇa, abandoning us;

original: 世間方盲，導師長逝；
analyzed: 世間方盲，導師長逝；
translated: The world is now blind, and the guide has departed;

original: 眾生貧困，商主告終；
analyzed: 眾生貧困，商主告終；
translated: Beings are impoverished, and the caravan leader has passed away;

original: 世界將昏，慧燈忽滅。
analyzed: 世界將昏，慧燈忽滅。
translated: The world is about to be plunged into darkness, and the lamp of wisdom has suddenly been extinguished.

original: 』「不空見！
analyzed: 』「不空見！
translated: Amogha-darśana!

original: 彼精進王如是追慕，極悲歎已，方與二兒詣世尊所，以諸香水沐浴聖身，復用眾香遍塗尊體，更以種種殊異華鬘、微妙樂音盡虔供養，然後方用迦尸迦衣妙疊纏裹，安處金棺及以鐵槨，其棺又以七寶雜廁。
analyzed: 彼精進王如是追慕，極悲歎已，方與二兒詣世尊所，以諸香水沐浴聖身，復用眾香遍塗尊體，更以種種殊異華鬘、微妙樂音盡虔供養，然後方用迦尸迦衣妙疊纏裹，安處金棺及以鐵槨，其棺又以七寶雜廁。
translated: King Vigataśoka, having thus lamented with extreme grief, went with his two sons to the place where the World-Honored One was. He bathed the holy body with various fragrant waters, anointed the venerable body with various fragrances, and made offerings with various extraordinary flower garlands and wonderful music to the utmost of his sincerity. Then he wrapped the body with fine cloth from Kāśi, placed it in a golden coffin, and put the coffin in an iron case, which was also adorned with the seven treasures.

original: 如是盛置彼佛身已，方聚清淨赤妙栴檀——高一由旬，縱廣正方一拘盧舍——散諸種華及以華鬘，燒然殊勝塗末香等，灌以蘇油，然後起火闍維寶聚如來色身。
analyzed: 如是盛置彼佛身已，方聚清淨赤妙栴檀——高一由旬，縱廣正方一拘盧舍——散諸種華及以華鬘，燒然殊勝塗末香等，灌以蘇油，然後起火闍維寶聚如來色身。
translated: Having thus enshrined the Buddha's body, he gathered pure red sandalwood, one yojana high and one krosa square, scattered various flowers and flower garlands, burned the most excellent ointments and powdered incense, sprinkled it with ghee, and then set fire to cremate the physical body of the Thus-Come One Jewel Accumulation.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aṅkura,

original: 時彼王子師子既見如來般涅槃已，如是思惟：
analyzed: 時彼王子師子既見如來般涅槃已，如是思惟：
translated: at that time, Prince Siṃha, having seen the Thus-Come One enter parinirvāṇa, had this thought:

original: 『天人大師捨我滅度，我於今日何義苟存？
analyzed: 『天人大師捨我滅度，我於今日何義苟存？
translated: 'The World-Honored One, the Great Teacher of gods and humans, has abandoned me and entered extinction. What meaning is there for me to remain alive today?

original: 今我若獲隨從如來、應供、等正覺而取滅度，豈不樂哉？
analyzed: 今我若獲隨從如來、應供、等正覺而取滅度，豈不樂哉？
translated: If I can now follow the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, and enter extinction, wouldn't that be joyful?'

original: 』「不空見！
analyzed: 』「不空見！
translated: Amogha-darśana!

original: 時彼王子如是念已，用諸名香自塗其身，復以諸香熏其衣服，以㲲纏裹，然後周圍放大猛火焚燒其身。
analyzed: 時彼王子如是念已，用諸名香自塗其身，復以諸香熏其衣服，以㲲纏裹，然後周圍放大猛火焚燒其身。
translated: At that time, the prince, having had this thought, used various famous fragrances to anoint his body, further perfumed his clothes with fragrances, wrapped himself in cotton, and then surrounded himself with a great raging fire to burn his body.

original: 火熾盛已，師子方於猛焰之中發大弘誓救諸眾生，歌讚歸依如來功德，以偈頌曰：
analyzed: 火熾盛已，師子方於猛焰之中發大弘誓救諸眾生，歌讚歸依如來功德，以偈頌曰：
translated: When the fire was blazing, the lion then made a great vow to save all beings in the midst of the fierce flames, singing praises and taking refuge in the Tathāgata's merits, speaking in verse, saying:

original: 「『世間寶中最尊上，　　今日放捨入無餘；
analyzed: 「『世間寶中最尊上，　　今日放捨入無餘；
translated: The most honored and supreme treasure in the world, today you have abandoned me and entered nirvāṇa without remainder;

original: 天人大師轉法輪，　　我等從此不復覩。
analyzed: 天人大師轉法輪，　　我等從此不復覩。
translated: The World-Honored One, the Great Teacher of gods and humans, has turned the Dharma wheel, but we will no longer see him from here on.

original: 法王利益無量眾，　　今已棄置入涅槃；
analyzed: 法王利益無量眾，　　今已棄置入涅槃；
translated: The Dharma King has benefited immeasurable beings, but now he has already abandoned them and entered nirvāṇa;

original: 吼宣如是大菩提，　　長不復見眾圍遶。
analyzed: 吼宣如是大菩提，　　長不復見眾圍遶。
translated: Roaring and proclaiming this great enlightenment, I will never again see the assembly surrounding him.

original: 不可思議大導師，　　說法能令聞者喜，
analyzed: 不可思議大導師，　　說法能令聞者喜，
translated: The inconceivable great guide, whose Dharma teachings delight the listeners,

original: 一切天人、諸魔、梵，　　從今永絕不聞聲；
analyzed: 一切天人、諸魔、梵，　　從今永絕不聞聲；
translated: From now on, all gods, humans, demons, and Brahmā will never again hear his voice;

original: 能施貧窮法財寶，　　為眾演說皆樂聞，
analyzed: 能施貧窮法財寶，　　為眾演說皆樂聞，
translated: He who bestows the Dharma treasures to the poor, whose teachings are all joyfully heard by the assembly,

original: 諸天、龍、鬼、人非人，　　自此長往無歸趣。
analyzed: 諸天、龍、鬼、人非人，　　自此長往無歸趣。
translated: From now on, the gods, dragons, ghosts, humans, and non-humans will have no refuge.

original: 世間從今無所依，　　偏悼我王何恃怙？
analyzed: 世間從今無所依，　　偏悼我王何恃怙？
translated: From now on, the world has no support, and I alone grieve for my king, whom can I rely on?

original: 并師子意失覆護，　　永不聞佛說法音。
analyzed: 并師子意失覆護，　　永不聞佛說法音。
translated: And I, Siṃhamati, have lost his protection, and will never again hear the Buddha's Dharma sounds.

original: 我寧捐軀及壽命，　　無用獨住於世間，
analyzed: 我寧捐軀及壽命，　　無用獨住於世間，
translated: I would rather abandon my body and life, uselessly living in this world,

original: 以是今滅所愛身，　　因茲更廣弘誓願。
analyzed: 以是今滅所愛身，　　因茲更廣弘誓願。
translated: Therefore, I will now end this cherished body and further expand my great vows.

original: 我於佛所種善根，　　父王亦常尊三寶，
analyzed: 我於佛所種善根，　　父王亦常尊三寶，
translated: The wholesome roots I have planted in the Buddha, and my father-king who always revered the Three Jewels,

original: 先願以此諸功德，　　令王及我證法身。
analyzed: 先願以此諸功德，　　令王及我證法身。
translated: First, I vow to use these merits to enable the king and myself to realize the Dharma body.

original: 於不思議諸佛所，　　供養修行眾善業，
analyzed: 於不思議諸佛所，　　供養修行眾善業，
translated: In the inconceivable presence of the buddhas, I make offerings and cultivate various wholesome karmas,

original: 普願群生同斯福，　　亦令我誓無虛言。
analyzed: 普願群生同斯福，　　亦令我誓無虛言。
translated: Universally vowing that all beings may share this merit, and also vowing that my own vows will not be empty words.

original: 世尊滅度我焚身，　　其有得聞或親見，
analyzed: 世尊滅度我焚身，　　其有得聞或親見，
translated: After the World-Honored One's nirvana, when my body is cremated, those who hear of it or witness it in person,

original: 一切皆同等正覺，　　非彼現在身證者。
analyzed: 一切皆同等正覺，　　非彼現在身證者。
translated: All will equally attain perfect enlightenment, not those who attain it in their present bodies.

original: 若人覺悟及夢中，　　但令見我今所作，
analyzed: 若人覺悟及夢中，　　但令見我今所作，
translated: If people are awakened or dreaming, but only see what I am doing now,

original: 彼必成佛無有疑，　　非彼現在身證者。
analyzed: 彼必成佛無有疑，　　非彼現在身證者。
translated: They will surely attain buddhahood without doubt, not those who attain it in their present bodies.

original: 我此愛身終敗壞，　　事同水沫無堅牢，
analyzed: 我此愛身終敗壞，　　事同水沫無堅牢，
translated: This beloved body of mine will eventually decay, its nature is like water bubbles, without solidity,

original: 願彼食我諸蟲獸，　　皆得速成菩提道。
analyzed: 願彼食我諸蟲獸，　　皆得速成菩提道。
translated: I vow that the insects and animals that eat my body will all quickly attain the path of enlightenment.

original: 今我誓行精進事，　　或有毀罵或輕訶，
analyzed: 今我誓行精進事，　　或有毀罵或輕訶，
translated: Now I vow to practice diligently, whether I am reviled or scorned,

original: 令我速得調御師，　　非彼現在身證者。
analyzed: 令我速得調御師，　　非彼現在身證者。
translated: May I quickly attain the Tamer, not the one who has realized the present body.

original: 我求無上正覺時，　　其或慈心相觀視，
analyzed: 我求無上正覺時，　　其或慈心相觀視，
translated: When I seek the unsurpassed right enlightenment, if they look upon me with a compassionate mind,

original: 即於世間疾成佛，　　非彼現在身證人。
analyzed: 即於世間疾成佛，　　非彼現在身證人。
translated: I will quickly become a Buddha in the world, not the one who has realized the present body.

original: 我今所願及未發，　　為是焚燒所愛身，
analyzed: 我今所願及未發，　　為是焚燒所愛身，
translated: For the sake of my present and future vows, I burn this beloved body.

original: 若此誠誓必不虛，　　令我還見滅度佛。
analyzed: 若此誠誓必不虛，　　令我還見滅度佛。
translated: If this sincere vow is certainly not false, may I see the Buddha who has attained extinction.

original: 如我暫得覩世尊，　　何異天師重出世？
analyzed: 如我暫得覩世尊，　　何異天師重出世？
translated: If I can temporarily see the World-Honored One, how is it different from the Heavenly Teacher appearing in the world again?

original: 今我雖復盛焦然，　　猶冀身存得觀佛，
analyzed: 今我雖復盛焦然，　　猶冀身存得觀佛，
translated: Although I am now severely burned, I still hope to preserve my body and see the Buddha.

original: 世尊智慧無障礙，　　常轉三世清淨輪。
analyzed: 世尊智慧無障礙，　　常轉三世清淨輪。
translated: The World-Honored One's wisdom is unobstructed, and he always turns the pure wheel of the three times.

original: 如昔廣利諸眾生，　　令我見佛從火起，
analyzed: 如昔廣利諸眾生，　　令我見佛從火起，
translated: Just as in the past he widely benefited all beings, may I see the Buddha rise from the fire.

original: 濟世大師若暫起，　　如先威力普眼尊。
analyzed: 濟世大師若暫起，　　如先威力普眼尊。
translated: If the World-Honored Savior temporarily rises, like the one with the power of the Universal Eye in the past,

original: 佛知師子心精誠，　　為之暫起視神力，
analyzed: 佛知師子心精誠，　　為之暫起視神力，
translated: The Buddha knew the sincere mind of the lion, and for him temporarily arose to witness the spiritual power,

original: 廣與世間興變事，　　令無量眾厭患身，
analyzed: 廣與世間興變事，　　令無量眾厭患身，
translated: Extensively performing transformations for the world, causing immeasurable beings to be disgusted with the body,

original: 畢竟利益諸眾生，　　還復焚身入寂處。
analyzed: 畢竟利益諸眾生，　　還復焚身入寂處。
translated: Ultimately benefiting all sentient beings, and then burning the body and entering the place of tranquility.

original: 大眾覩佛巨神變，　　以清淨意讚妙音：
analyzed: 大眾覩佛巨神變，　　以清淨意讚妙音：
translated: The great assembly witnessed the Buddha's great spiritual transformation, and with a pure mind praised the wonderful sound:

original: 『諸佛妙法難思議，　　戒及禪定亦復然，
analyzed: 『諸佛妙法難思議，　　戒及禪定亦復然，
translated: The wonderful Dharma of the Buddhas is difficult to fathom, and the precepts and meditative concentration are also like this,

original: 智慧解脫不可量，　　神通變化亦難測，
analyzed: 智慧解脫不可量，　　神通變化亦難測，
translated: Wisdom and liberation are immeasurable, and spiritual powers and transformations are also difficult to fathom,

original: 雖已滅度能淨我，　　今故歸命焰熾身。
analyzed: 雖已滅度能淨我，　　今故歸命焰熾身。
translated: Although already extinguished, able to purify me, I now take refuge in the blazing body.

original: 世尊威德無有比，　　神通已達彼岸邊，
analyzed: 世尊威德無有比，　　神通已達彼岸邊，
translated: The World-Honored One's majestic virtue is incomparable, and his spiritual powers have already reached the other shore,

original: 滅度能令生厭離，　　今我歸依普眼觀。
analyzed: 滅度能令生厭離，　　今我歸依普眼觀。
translated: Extinction can cause aversion, I now take refuge in the universal eye.

original: 慈悲一切最尊勝，　　能以自心知他心，
analyzed: 慈悲一切最尊勝，　　能以自心知他心，
translated: Compassionate to all, most honored and supreme, able to know others' minds with one's own mind,

original: 悉治無邊界眾生，　　歸命無等善逝者。
analyzed: 悉治無邊界眾生，　　歸命無等善逝者。
translated: All heal the sentient beings in the boundless realms, I take refuge in the unequaled Sugata.

original: 於諸醫中第一尊，　　常以妙藥施眾生，
analyzed: 於諸醫中第一尊，　　常以妙藥施眾生，
translated: The foremost honored one among all physicians, always bestowing wonderful medicine upon sentient beings,

original: 能除無量眾病苦，　　歸命憐愍救護人。
analyzed: 能除無量眾病苦，　　歸命憐愍救護人。
translated: Able to eliminate the suffering of immeasurable illnesses, I take refuge in the one who has compassion and saves people.

original: 以我稱讚諸善根，　　恭敬供養諸功德，
analyzed: 以我稱讚諸善根，　　恭敬供養諸功德，
translated: With the wholesome roots of praising you, the merits of respectful offerings,

original: 放捨愛身所獲福，　　先願利益諸眾生。
analyzed: 放捨愛身所獲福，　　先願利益諸眾生。
translated: And the blessings obtained from giving up my beloved body, I first vow to benefit all sentient beings.'

original: 』「不空見！
analyzed: 』「不空見！
translated: Amogha-darśana!

original: 時彼王子師子發斯大願以自莊嚴，然後增火卒捨身命。
analyzed: 時彼王子師子發斯大願以自莊嚴，然後增火卒捨身命。
translated: At that time, Prince Siṃha made this great vow to adorn himself, and then increased the fire and suddenly gave up his body and life.

original: 時諸世間天、人、梵、魔、沙門、婆羅門、乃至一切人非人等，見斯事已，咸於世間生重厭離。
analyzed: 時諸世間天、人、梵、魔、沙門、婆羅門、乃至一切人非人等，見斯事已，咸於世間生重厭離。
translated: At that time, all the worldly gods, humans, Brahmā, Māra, śramaṇas, brāhmaṇas, and even all humans and non-humans, having seen this, all deeply renounced the world.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Amogha-darśana!

original: 時彼王子捨身命已，即生梵天作大梵王，於諸梵中最尊、最勝，有大威德、具大神通。
analyzed: 時彼王子捨身命已，即生梵天作大梵王，於諸梵中最尊、最勝，有大威德、具大神通。
translated: At that time, after the prince had given up his body and life, he was immediately reborn in the Brahma Heaven and became the Great Brahma King. Among all the Brahmas, he was the most honored, the most excellent, possessed great majestic virtue, and was endowed with great spiritual powers.

original: 「不空見！
analyzed: 「不空見！
translated: Aniruddha!

original: 時彼王子生梵宮已，即自思惟：
analyzed: 時彼王子生梵宮已，即自思惟：
translated: At that time, after the prince was born in the Brahma Palace, he immediately thought to himself:

original: 『我從何處作何善根而來生此，得有如是功德、果報、大神通力？
analyzed: 『我從何處作何善根而來生此，得有如是功德、果報、大神通力？
translated: From where did I create what wholesome roots, and come to be born here, to have such merits, rewards, and great spiritual powers?

original: 』作是念已，便自了了分明見知：
analyzed: 』作是念已，便自了了分明見知：
translated: Having had this thought, he immediately clearly and distinctly saw and knew:

original: 『我於人間為精進王子，我與父王眾具供養、恭敬、謌讚寶聚世尊。
analyzed: 『我於人間為精進王子，我與父王眾具供養、恭敬、謌讚寶聚世尊。
translated: I was Prince Jingjin in the human realm. I and the father king made offerings with various implements, respectfully praised and extolled the World-Honored One Baozhu.

original: 世尊滅度，我即焚身於彼熾然猛火之中，發大誓願、歎佛功德，以此善根今生梵宮。
analyzed: 世尊滅度，我即焚身於彼熾然猛火之中，發大誓願、歎佛功德，以此善根今生梵宮。
translated: After the World-Honored One's nirvana, I burned my body. In the midst of that blazing, fierce fire, I made a great vow and praised the Buddha's merits. With these wholesome roots, I am now born in the Brahma Palace.

original: 然我今應還下人間，開慰我父、答所生恩，復當供養寶聚如來入於涅槃燒身處也。
analyzed: 然我今應還下人間，開慰我父、答所生恩，復當供養寶聚如來入於涅槃燒身處也。
translated: However, I should now return to the human realm to comfort my father and repay the kindness of my birth, and I will also make offerings to the Buddha's relics and the place where the Buddha entered nirvana and his body was cremated.'

original: 』「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 』「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aniruddha,

original: 時大梵王如是念已，與眷屬天於彼宮沒，猶如壯士屈伸臂頃即至人間，往詣寶聚如來、應供、等正覺闍毘身處，以天眾香——所謂天末旃檀，及天牛頭沈水、多摩羅跋香等——而為供養。
analyzed: 時大梵王如是念已，與眷屬天於彼宮沒，猶如壯士屈伸臂頃即至人間，往詣寶聚如來、應供、等正覺闍毘身處，以天眾香——所謂天末旃檀，及天牛頭沈水、多摩羅跋香等——而為供養。
translated: when the Great Brahma King had this thought, he and his retinue of gods disappeared from their palace and in the time it takes for a strong man to flex his arm, they arrived in the human realm and went to the place where the Buddha's body was cremated. With heavenly incense - namely, heavenly sandalwood powder, heavenly ox-head aloeswood, and tamalapatra incense - they made offerings.

original: 復散種種天上妙華——華若車輪，猶雲遍滿——而為供養。
analyzed: 復散種種天上妙華——華若車輪，猶雲遍滿——而為供養。
translated: They also scattered various wonderful heavenly flowers - flowers like cart wheels, filling the sky like clouds - to make offerings.

original: 「師子梵天供養佛已，方慰其父精進王言：
analyzed: 「師子梵天供養佛已，方慰其父精進王言：
translated: After the Lion of the Brahma Heaven made offerings to the Buddha, he comforted his father, King Diligence, saying:

original: 『大王當知，王子師子燒身喪命，今我是也，我時即生大梵天中。
analyzed: 『大王當知，王子師子燒身喪命，今我是也，我時即生大梵天中。
translated: 'Great King, you should know that Prince Siṃha who burned his body and lost his life is now me. At that time, I was immediately reborn in the Heaven of Great Brahmā.

original: 願王勿復憂悲痛惱，惟應歡喜，深自慶快。
analyzed: 願王勿復憂悲痛惱，惟應歡喜，深自慶快。
translated: May the King not worry, grieve, or be distressed anymore, but should rejoice and deeply congratulate himself.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 王今已獲第一大利。
analyzed: 王今已獲第一大利。
translated: The Great King has now attained the greatest benefit.

original: 所以者何？
analyzed: 所以者何？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 諸佛、世尊難遭難遇，而王已得值遇世尊寶聚如來、應供、等正覺，尊重、恭敬、具足、供養，是為希有第一大利。
analyzed: 諸佛、世尊難遭難遇，而王已得值遇世尊寶聚如來、應供、等正覺，尊重、恭敬、具足、供養，是為希有第一大利。
translated: The Buddhas, the World-Honored Ones, are difficult to encounter, but the King has already encountered the World-Honored One, the Jewel-Heap Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, and has respected, revered, and made perfect offerings to him. This is a rare and greatest benefit.

original: 是故，大王！
analyzed: 是故，大王！
translated: Therefore, Great King!

original: 從今已後惟當一心受持是法，弟師子意亦應如是受持此法。
analyzed: 從今已後惟當一心受持是法，弟師子意亦應如是受持此法。
translated: From now on, you should single-mindedly uphold this Dharma, and your younger brother Siṃha意 should also uphold this Dharma in the same way.

original: 復應供養世尊舍利，處處流布、廣興塔廟；
analyzed: 復應供養世尊舍利，處處流布、廣興塔廟；
translated: You should also make offerings to the World-Honored One's relics, spreading them everywhere and erecting stūpas;

original: 我於梵宮亦常如是，持斯妙法、尊奉舍利。
analyzed: 我於梵宮亦常如是，持斯妙法、尊奉舍利。
translated: I will also always do the same in the Brahmā Palace, upholding this wonderful Dharma and venerating the relics.'

original: 』如是言已，忽然不現。
analyzed: 』如是言已，忽然不現。
translated: Having said this, he suddenly disappeared.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Aṅgulimāla,

original: 時彼精進王聞梵語故，即與其子師子意者往詣寶聚如來、應、等正覺舍利之所，恭敬、禮拜、歌誦、讚歎，持一切香、一切華鬘、并諸音樂，復持諸種幢幡、寶蓋奉獻供養。
analyzed: 時彼精進王聞梵語故，即與其子師子意者往詣寶聚如來、應、等正覺舍利之所，恭敬、禮拜、歌誦、讚歎，持一切香、一切華鬘、并諸音樂，復持諸種幢幡、寶蓋奉獻供養。
translated: at that time King Viśeṣagāmin, having heard the Brahmā's words, went together with his son Siṃhamat to the relics of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One Ratnagarbha, to pay respects, make offerings, sing praises, and offer all kinds of incense, all kinds of flower garlands, and various kinds of music. He also held various kinds of banners, flags, and jeweled canopies to make offerings.

original: 「又少時間於彼八萬四千諸城，純以七寶興起八萬四千塔——高一由旬，面各廣長一拘盧舍——殊特端嚴，光耀可愛，安止舍利，咸令供奉。
analyzed: 「又少時間於彼八萬四千諸城，純以七寶興起八萬四千塔——高一由旬，面各廣長一拘盧舍——殊特端嚴，光耀可愛，安止舍利，咸令供奉。
translated: In a short time, in those eighty-four thousand cities, he erected eighty-four thousand stūpas made entirely of the seven precious substances - each stūpa one yojana high and one krośa wide on each side - extraordinary and upright, shining and delightful, enshrining the relics, all making offerings to them.

original: 「又於一一寶塔之所常然八萬四千燈明，各各復以一切名香、一切妙華及以華鬘、一切幢幡、一切寶蓋、一切樂音——鼓、蠃、角、貝、鍾、鈴、磬、鐸——凡是眾具莫不畢備，如是供養，受持是法。
analyzed: 「又於一一寶塔之所常然八萬四千燈明，各各復以一切名香、一切妙華及以華鬘、一切幢幡、一切寶蓋、一切樂音——鼓、蠃、角、貝、鍾、鈴、磬、鐸——凡是眾具莫不畢備，如是供養，受持是法。
translated: Moreover, at each of the jeweled stupas, he always lit 84,000 lamps, and with all kinds of famous incense, all kinds of wonderful flowers and flower garlands, all kinds of banners and canopies, all kinds of musical sounds of drums, conches, horns, bells, and chimes, he made offerings without omission, upholding this Dharma.

original: 「彼精進王以斯善根，於八萬四千劫不生惡道，及師子意亦同果報；
analyzed: 「彼精進王以斯善根，於八萬四千劫不生惡道，及師子意亦同果報；
translated: Because of these wholesome roots, King Vigataśoka did not fall into evil paths for 84,000 kalpas, and Siṃhamat also had the same karmic retribution;

original: 王大夫人名曰善意、其最大臣名曰無瞋，亦於八萬四千劫中受勝果報。
analyzed: 王大夫人名曰善意、其最大臣名曰無瞋，亦於八萬四千劫中受勝果報。
translated: The king's chief consort named Sumati and his chief minister named Avyāpāda also received excellent karmic retribution for 84,000 kalpas.

original: 彼王如是於諸劫中次第供養六萬諸佛，所生常受轉輪王身，正法治化，利益眾生。
analyzed: 彼王如是於諸劫中次第供養六萬諸佛，所生常受轉輪王身，正法治化，利益眾生。
translated: The king thus made offerings to 60,000 buddhas in sequence over those kalpas, and in his rebirths always received the body of a wheel-turning king, ruling with the true Dharma and benefiting beings.

original: 「復次，不空見！
analyzed: 「復次，不空見！
translated: Furthermore, Ananyagāmin!

original: 彼寶聚佛滅度之後，時節未幾有一菩薩摩訶薩名普密王，現生世間。
analyzed: 彼寶聚佛滅度之後，時節未幾有一菩薩摩訶薩名普密王，現生世間。
translated: After the parinirvāṇa of that Ratnasaṃbhava Buddha, not long after, there was a bodhisattva mahāsattva named Samantabhadra who appeared in the world.

original: 為世間故，捨家出家，示修苦行，詣菩提樹，坐於道場，以一念慧斷除無明煩惱習氣，即證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 為世間故，捨家出家，示修苦行，詣菩提樹，坐於道場，以一念慧斷除無明煩惱習氣，即證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: For the sake of the world, he left home to go forth, demonstrated the practice of austerities, went to the bodhi tree, sat at the site of enlightenment, and with a single moment of wisdom eliminated ignorance, afflictions, and habitual tendencies, and immediately realized supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 「不空見！
analyzed: 「不空見！
translated: Amogha-darśana!

original: 時彼師子大梵天王以天眼觀，見普密王如來、應供、等正覺出興於世，即復還下住虛空中，持天眾香及以妙華散於佛上，然後至地右遶三周，恭敬合掌，頭面禮拜，勸請世尊轉大法輪。
analyzed: 時彼師子大梵天王以天眼觀，見普密王如來、應供、等正覺出興於世，即復還下住虛空中，持天眾香及以妙華散於佛上，然後至地右遶三周，恭敬合掌，頭面禮拜，勸請世尊轉大法輪。

translated: Immediately from the brahma palace he returned to the Buddha's place, and made offerings in full to the Honored One among humans,

original: 奉持微妙天華香，　　投散彼佛碎身地。
analyzed: 奉持微妙天華香，　　投散彼佛碎身地。
translated: Respectfully holding subtle heavenly flowers and incense, he scattered them on the ground where the Buddha's body was in pieces.

original: 彼寶聚尊涅槃後，　　其間時節無幾何，
analyzed: 彼寶聚尊涅槃後，　　其間時節無幾何，
translated: Not long after the nirvana of that Honored One of Accumulated Treasures,

original: 復有普密天人師，　　為利世間故興世，
analyzed: 復有普密天人師，　　為利世間故興世，
translated: There was another teacher of gods and humans, Samantabhadra, who arose in the world for the sake of benefiting the world,

original: 坐於道樹等至真，　　是天中天號大覺。
analyzed: 坐於道樹等至真，　　是天中天號大覺。
translated: Sitting at the bodhi tree, he attained perfect enlightenment, this god among gods was called the Great Awakened One.

original: 大梵天王設供養，　　恭敬頂禮兩足尊，
analyzed: 大梵天王設供養，　　恭敬頂禮兩足尊，
translated: The great brahma king made offerings and respectfully bowed to the Honored One with two feet,

original: 請轉法輪利世間，　　佛知心淨默然許。
analyzed: 請轉法輪利世間，　　佛知心淨默然許。
translated: Requesting him to turn the wheel of the Dharma and benefit the world, the Buddha knew his mind was pure and silently accepted.

original: 梵王聞法大歡慶，　　身得安樂心怡然，
analyzed: 梵王聞法大歡慶，　　身得安樂心怡然，
translated: The brahma king heard the Dharma and greatly rejoiced, his body attained peace and comfort, his mind was delighted,

original: 更發殊常大誓願，　　植不思議眾善根。
analyzed: 更發殊常大誓願，　　植不思議眾善根。
translated: And made extraordinary great vows, planting inconceivable roots of goodness.

original: 一劫值遇五千佛，　　皆得親承興供養，
analyzed: 一劫值遇五千佛，　　皆得親承興供養，
translated: In one eon, encountering five thousand buddhas, all able to personally serve and make offerings,

original: 智者不應更他疑，　　彼時師子汝即是。
analyzed: 智者不應更他疑，　　彼時師子汝即是。
translated: The wise should not doubt anyone else, at that time, that lion was you.

original: 不空見時為吾息，　　汝後事佛經五千，
analyzed: 不空見時為吾息，　　汝後事佛經五千，
translated: Amogha! At that time, you were my son, you served the Buddha for five thousand eons,

original: 我皆明見汝燒身，　　求斯無上菩提道。
analyzed: 我皆明見汝燒身，　　求斯無上菩提道。
translated: I clearly see you burning your body, seeking this unsurpassed bodhi path.

original: 汝復無量千佛所，　　於彼滅度舍利時，
analyzed: 汝復無量千佛所，　　於彼滅度舍利時，
translated: You will also, at the sites of countless thousands of buddhas, when their relics are being enshrined,

original: 亦燒無量所愛軀，　　皆為他樂自受苦。
analyzed: 亦燒無量所愛軀，　　皆為他樂自受苦。
translated: Also burn countless beloved bodies, all for others' happiness, enduring suffering yourself.

original: 我知汝今及異世，　　無量千生長時修，
analyzed: 我知汝今及異世，　　無量千生長時修，
translated: I know that now and in other worlds, for countless thousands of lifetimes, for a long time, you cultivate,

original: 或佛現在、或涅槃，　　汝常建斯誠實語。
analyzed: 或佛現在、或涅槃，　　汝常建斯誠實語。
translated: Whether the Buddha is present or in nirvana, you always establish this sincere speech.

original: 經昔無量百千生，　　惟我神力能知汝，
analyzed: 經昔無量百千生，　　惟我神力能知汝，
translated: For countless hundreds of thousands of lifetimes in the past, only I, with spiritual powers, can know you,

original: 不空！
analyzed: 不空！
translated: Amogha!

original: 汝久發斯願，　　果報今者皆明現。
analyzed: 汝久發斯願，　　果報今者皆明現。
translated: You have long made this vow, and its fruits and retributions are now all clearly manifest.

original: 汝於諸佛大師前，　　不思議行悉圓滿，
analyzed: 汝於諸佛大師前，　　不思議行悉圓滿，
translated: In the presence of the Buddhas, the Great Teachers, you have perfected inconceivable practices,

original: 常業歌讚兩足尊，　　苦行熏修諸大誓。
analyzed: 常業歌讚兩足尊，　　苦行熏修諸大誓。
translated: Always praising the Honored One with two feet through ascetic cultivation and great vows.

original: 今獲偈歎大法王，　　斯由往積勝因緣；
analyzed: 今獲偈歎大法王，　　斯由往積勝因緣；
translated: Now you have obtained the praise of the Great Dharma King, due to the superior causes and conditions accumulated in the past;

original: 又於普密王佛前，　　攝取最上無邊願。
analyzed: 又於普密王佛前，　　攝取最上無邊願。
translated: And in the presence of the Buddha Samantabhadra, you have taken up the supreme boundless vows.

original: 汝今果獲如斯報，　　蒙佛、如來現威神。
analyzed: 汝今果獲如斯報，　　蒙佛、如來現威神。
translated: Now you have obtained this reward, and have been blessed by the Buddha, the Tathagata's majestic spiritual power.

original: 時不空見於眾所，　　恭敬合掌頂禮佛，
analyzed: 時不空見於眾所，　　恭敬合掌頂禮佛，
translated: At that time, Akasagarbha, in the presence of the assembly, respectfully joined his palms and bowed to the Buddha,

original: 請問天尊調御師，　　慈悲利益眾生事：
analyzed: 請問天尊調御師，　　慈悲利益眾生事：
translated: And asked the Honored One, the Tamer and Leader, about the compassionate and beneficial matters for sentient beings:

original: 「大仙！
analyzed: 「大仙！
translated: Great Sage!

original: 我曾何誓願，　　而能捨棄無量生？
analyzed: 我曾何誓願，　　而能捨棄無量生？
translated: What vows have I ever made, that I am able to abandon countless lives?

original: 惟願世尊開少分，　　我蒙聖說乃能了。
analyzed: 惟願世尊開少分，　　我蒙聖說乃能了。
translated: I only pray that the World-Honored One will reveal a little, and I will be able to understand upon hearing the Sage's words.

original: 」「不空！
analyzed: 」「不空！
translated: Akasagarbha!

original: 汝於往昔事，　　吾今為汝粗說之，汝於雲音如來所，　　已發如是廣大願：
analyzed: 汝於往昔事，　　吾今為汝粗說之，汝於雲音如來所，　　已發如是廣大願：
translated: I will now roughly explain for you the events of the past. In the presence of the Tathāgata Meghaśabda, you have already made such vast vows:

original: 『諸佛若證菩提時，　　當令我身常奉覲。
analyzed: 『諸佛若證菩提時，　　當令我身常奉覲。
translated: 'When the buddhas attain enlightenment, may I always be able to serve and attend them.'

original: 』又於帝幢普眼佛，　　彼時亦發大誓願：
analyzed: 』又於帝幢普眼佛，　　彼時亦發大誓願：
translated: And in the presence of the Buddha Samantaprabhāsa, you also made a great vow:

original: 『世間若有最導師，　　當令我即同斯道。
analyzed: 『世間若有最導師，　　當令我即同斯道。
translated: 'If there is a supreme guide in the world, may I follow the same path.'

original: 』汝於日燈如來所，　　亦發勝妙諸行願。
analyzed: 』汝於日燈如來所，　　亦發勝妙諸行願。
translated: In the presence of the Tathāgata Sūryapradīpa, you also made vows for supreme and wonderful practices.

original: 汝不空見惟我知，　　造作眾寶經行處，
analyzed: 汝不空見惟我知，　　造作眾寶經行處，
translated: You, Akṣayamati, only I know that you have created a place for practicing the sūtras with various treasures,

original: 或營壯麗佛精舍，　　若搆殊異僧伽藍，
analyzed: 或營壯麗佛精舍，　　若搆殊異僧伽藍，
translated: Or built magnificent buddha-temples, or constructed extraordinary monasteries,

original: 彼皆微妙七寶成，　　一切資具奉諸佛。
analyzed: 彼皆微妙七寶成，　　一切資具奉諸佛。
translated: All of them are exquisite, made of the seven treasures, and all the necessities are offered to the buddhas.

original: 於不思議眾所尊，　　人中師子善生佛，
analyzed: 於不思議眾所尊，　　人中師子善生佛，
translated: In the presence of the inconceivable, most revered one, the Buddha Suprabhāsa, the lion among men,

original: 持七寶蓋及眾具，　　供奉超世天中天。
analyzed: 持七寶蓋及眾具，　　供奉超世天中天。
translated: Holding parasols of the seven treasures and various implements, I made offerings to the unsurpassed god among gods.

original: 於彼普眼如來所，　　爾時又起妙願行，
analyzed: 於彼普眼如來所，　　爾時又起妙願行，
translated: At that time, in the presence of the Tathāgata Samantabhadra, I further gave rise to the practice of wondrous vows,

original: 廣施燈明眾供調，　　奉獻世間天人師。
analyzed: 廣施燈明眾供調，　　奉獻世間天人師。
translated: Extensively making offerings of lamps and various adjustments, I presented them to the teacher of gods and humans in the world.

original: 汝於如是無量佛，　　過千萬億那由他，
analyzed: 汝於如是無量佛，　　過千萬億那由他，
translated: To such immeasurable buddhas, more than a thousand koṭīs of nayutas,

original: 自受勤苦安眾生，　　發彼莊嚴弘廣誓。
analyzed: 自受勤苦安眾生，　　發彼莊嚴弘廣誓。
translated: I myself endured hardship and comforted sentient beings, giving rise to that vast and extensive vow of adornment.

original: 汝於普密王佛前，　　所發誠願我今說：
analyzed: 汝於普密王佛前，　　所發誠願我今說：
translated: In the presence of the Buddha Samantabhadra, the sincere vows you gave rise to I will now speak of:

original: 『如其修行成佛者，　　我所散華遍大地。
analyzed: 『如其修行成佛者，　　我所散華遍大地。
translated: If I attain buddhahood through practicing in this way, may the flowers I scatter cover the entire earth.

original: 』汝於雲雷音佛所，　　為世間故發斯願：
analyzed: 』汝於雲雷音佛所，　　為世間故發斯願：
translated: In the presence of the Buddha Meghadundubhisvararāja, you gave rise to this vow for the sake of the world:

original: 『若有眾生聞我名，　　願彼咸即成佛道。
analyzed: 『若有眾生聞我名，　　願彼咸即成佛道。
translated: If any sentient beings hear my name, may they all immediately attain buddhahood.

original: 』復於帝釋幢佛前，　　廣興供養因誓願：
analyzed: 』復於帝釋幢佛前，　　廣興供養因誓願：
translated: Again, in the presence of the Buddha Śakradhvaja, you extensively made offerings and gave rise to this vow:

original: 『凡我所處若見聞，　　彼彼皆得成佛道。
analyzed: 『凡我所處若見聞，　　彼彼皆得成佛道。
translated: 'Wherever I am, if seen or heard, may they all attain Buddhahood.

original: 汝於日燈如來所，　　奉施七寶經行處，
analyzed: 汝於日燈如來所，　　奉施七寶經行處，
translated: You offered a walkway made of the seven treasures to the Tathagata Day Lamp,

original: 無邊威所大明佛，　　汝當爾時發願言：
analyzed: 無邊威所大明佛，　　汝當爾時發願言：
translated: And the Buddha of Great Illumination with Boundless Authority, you made a vow at that time, saying:

original: 『常施勝處妙莊嚴，　　願我佛剎亦如是。
analyzed: 『常施勝處妙莊嚴，　　願我佛剎亦如是。
translated: 'Always offer the supreme place with wonderful adornments, may my Buddha land be like this.

original: 』汝於月上如來所：
analyzed: 』汝於月上如來所：
translated: You, in the presence of the Tathagata Moon on High:

original: 『願得第一最天宮，佛尊處中而遊化，　　眾生遊者悉成佛。
analyzed: 『願得第一最天宮，佛尊處中而遊化，　　眾生遊者悉成佛。
translated: 'May I obtain the foremost celestial palace, with the Honored Buddha dwelling and transforming in it, may all beings who enter become Buddhas.'

original: 』汝於澡浴善逝前，　　實作如是至誠願：
analyzed: 』汝於澡浴善逝前，　　實作如是至誠願：
translated: You, in front of the Well-Gone One after bathing, truly made this sincere vow:

original: 『若於夏日盛暑時，　　眾生身心離熱惱。
analyzed: 『若於夏日盛暑時，　　眾生身心離熱惱。
translated: 'If in the hot summer days, may beings be free from mental and physical distress.'

original: 』汝於鴦祇羅佛所，　　亦發如是增上願：
analyzed: 』汝於鴦祇羅佛所，　　亦發如是增上願：
translated: You, in the presence of Buddha Angiara, also made this superior vow:

original: 『恒於長夜黑闇時，　　願施燈明除迷惑。
analyzed: 『恒於長夜黑闇時，　　願施燈明除迷惑。
translated: 'Always in the long night of darkness, may I offer lamps and light to dispel confusion.'

original: 若我捨施身命處，　　其有食肉諸眾生，
analyzed: 若我捨施身命處，　　其有食肉諸眾生，
translated: If I give away my body and life, all the sentient beings who eat my flesh,

original: 必皆成佛無有疑，　　非彼現在身證者。
analyzed: 必皆成佛無有疑，　　非彼現在身證者。
translated: Will surely attain Buddhahood without doubt, not those who attain realization in their present bodies.

original: 或於覺悟及夢裏，　　若有眾生聞我名，
analyzed: 或於覺悟及夢裏，　　若有眾生聞我名，
translated: If any sentient beings hear my name, whether in the state of awakening or in dreams,

original: 一切成佛無有疑，　　非彼現在身證者。
analyzed: 一切成佛無有疑，　　非彼現在身證者。
translated: All will attain Buddhahood without doubt, not those who attain realization in their present bodies.

original: 汝於勇猛精進時，　　其有愛憎爾所作，
analyzed: 汝於勇猛精進時，　　其有愛憎爾所作，
translated: When you are diligently and vigorously practicing, all the love and hatred you create,

original: 斯等皆當成法王，　　非彼現在得證者。
analyzed: 斯等皆當成法王，　　非彼現在得證者。
translated: These will all become Dharma Kings, not those who attain realization in their present bodies.

original: 汝先無量世生處，　　於彼恒願求菩提，
analyzed: 汝先無量世生處，　　於彼恒願求菩提，
translated: In all the places you have been born in immeasurable past lives, you have always aspired to seek enlightenment,

original: 我今說汝實功德，　　當來必獲無上尊。
analyzed: 我今說汝實功德，　　當來必獲無上尊。
translated: I now tell you your true merits, and in the future you will surely attain the unsurpassed honor.

original: 若有禽獸及餘眾，　　彼必成佛無復疑，
analyzed: 若有禽獸及餘眾，　　彼必成佛無復疑，
translated: If there are any birds, beasts, or other beings, they will surely attain Buddhahood without doubt,

original: 諸是食汝身肉等，　　一切自然證法身。
analyzed: 諸是食汝身肉等，　　一切自然證法身。
translated: All those who eat your flesh and so forth will naturally realize the Dharma body.

original: 我知汝有千數行，　　皆為利益諸眾生，
analyzed: 我知汝有千數行，　　皆為利益諸眾生，
translated: I know you have a thousand practices, all for the benefit of sentient beings,

original: 若有聞者或生疑，　　以時未至我不說。
analyzed: 若有聞者或生疑，　　以時未至我不說。
translated: If there are any who hear and give rise to doubt, I do not speak because the time has not yet come.

original: 凡我所說汝諸事，　　其或眾生願樂聞，
analyzed: 凡我所說汝諸事，　　其或眾生願樂聞，
translated: All the matters I have spoken of, if there are sentient beings who wish to hear,

original: 彼彼得佛必無疑，　　非餘現在身證者。
analyzed: 彼彼得佛必無疑，　　非餘現在身證者。
translated: They will attain Buddhahood without doubt, not by other present body-realizers.

original: 若人欲見救世尊，　　轉此清淨勝法輪；
analyzed: 若人欲見救世尊，　　轉此清淨勝法輪；
translated: If a person wishes to see the World-Honored Savior, turning this pure and supreme Dharma wheel;

original: 聞已能破諸苦惱，　　為證菩提故樂聞。
analyzed: 聞已能破諸苦惱，　　為證菩提故樂聞。
translated: Having heard, they are able to destroy all suffering and distress, and delight in hearing for the sake of realizing enlightenment.

original: 若人欲見三世佛，　　恭敬供養上福田，
analyzed: 若人欲見三世佛，　　恭敬供養上福田，
translated: If a person wishes to see the Buddhas of the three times, respectfully making offerings to the supreme field of blessings,

original: 具足積聚諸功德，　　必先受持此三昧。
analyzed: 具足積聚諸功德，　　必先受持此三昧。
translated: Fully accumulating all merits and virtues, they must first uphold this samādhi.

original: 為利世間天人故，　　世尊宣說是事已，
analyzed: 為利世間天人故，　　世尊宣說是事已，
translated: For the sake of benefiting the devas and humans of the world, the World-Honored One has proclaimed this matter,

original: 遂下法座而徐行，　　即還歸寂於本室。
analyzed: 遂下法座而徐行，　　即還歸寂於本室。
translated: And then descended from the Dharma seat and slowly proceeded, returning to his original chamber in silence.

original: 大方等大集經菩薩念佛三昧分卷第二
analyzed: 大方等大集經菩薩念佛三昧分卷第二
translated: Mahāsaṃnipāta Sūtra, Bodhisattva Samādhi of Mindfulness of the Buddha, Scroll 2
